item.title: ðŸ‡®ðŸ‡¸ Iceland
item.description: Place like no other Let’s embark together on a trip over Iceland, during which I will introduce my thoughts and memories from the Land of Ice and Fire. I highly recommend listening to Light of the Seven in the background. Niceland I came up with the name inside the car, when everyone was looking through the windows and constantly someone was saying “nice”. It is a nice land indeed, but only saying it is nice is an understatement.
